kpi_descriptions.TSurf: Surface temperature, important for analyzing heat distribution.
kpi_descriptions.WindSpd: Wind speed at various vertical levels, affecting air flow and thermal comfort.
kpi_descriptions.WindDir: Wind direction, indicating the angle from which the wind is blowing.
kpi_descriptions.RelHum: Relative humidity in the atmosphere, indicating the percentage of moisture in the air.
kpi_descriptions.TMRT: Mean radiant temperature, a measure of the effective radiation temperature felt by a body.
kpi_descriptions.TMRTBiomet: Biometeorological index for mean radiant temperature, indicating its effect on human comfort.
kpi_descriptions.Objects: Count or representation of objects within the model, such as buildings or vegetation.
